name: Babel
description:
A wax-sealed, blood-stained depiction of the tower built in Shinar, Babylon. 3500 B.C.

The construction of the Tower of Babel was seen as an act of defiance against the Most-High.

What follows is a vast amount of confusion and dispersion, as well as the emergence of a multiplicity of living tongues.

The origin story of Language itself?
